00177 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00178 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::IsEmpty() const
00179 {
00180        return m_sizes.IsSizeEmpty();
00181 }

00212 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00213 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetSize(int dimension) const
00214 {
00215        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00216        I_ASSERT(dimension < Dimensions);
00217 
00218        return m_sizes[dimension];

00222 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00223 inline const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetAt(const IndexType& index) const
00224 {
00225        I_ASSERT(index.IsInside(m_sizes));
00226 
00227        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00228        I_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00229 
00230        return m_elements[elementIndex];
00231 }

00250

00281 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00282 inline Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::operator[](const IndexType& index)
00283 {
00284        int elementIndex = GetElementIndex(index);
00285        I_ASSERT(elementIndex < int(m_elements.size()));
00286 
00287        return m_elements[elementIndex];

00290 
00291 // inline protected methods
00292 
00293 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00294 inline int TArray<Element, Dimensions>::GetElementIndex(const IndexType& index) const
00295 {
00296        int elementIndex = 0;
00297        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00298        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00299               I_ASSERT(index[i] >= 0);
00300               I_ASSERT(index[i] < m_sizes[i]);
00301 
00302               elementIndex += index[i] * cumulatedSizes;
00303 
00304               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00305        }
00306 
00307        return elementIndex;
00308 }
00309

00313 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00314 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::TArray()
00315 {
00316        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00317               m_sizes[i] = 0;
00318        }
00319 }

00338 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00339 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::SetSizes(const SizesType& sizes)
00340 {
00341        m_sizes = sizes;
00342 
00343        UpdateElementsSize();
00344 
00345        return true;

00349 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00350 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::SetSize(int dimension, int size)
00351 {
00352        I_ASSERT(dimension >= 0);
00353        I_ASSERT(dimension < Dimensions);
00354 
00355        m_sizes[dimension] = size;
00356 
00357        UpdateElementsSize();
00358 
00359        return true;

00363 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00364 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::SetAllElements(const Element& value)
00365 {
00366        for (         typename Elements::Iterator iter = m_elements.begin();
00367                             iter != m_elements.end();
00368                             ++iter){
00369               *iter = value;
00370        }
00371 }

00374 // protected methods
00375 
00376 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00377 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::UpdateElementsSize()
00378 {
00379        int cumulatedSizes = 1;
00380        for (int i = 0; i < Dimensions; ++i){
00381               cumulatedSizes *= m_sizes[i];
00382        }
00383 
00384        m_elements.resize(cumulatedSizes);
00385 }
00386 
00387 
00388 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00389 void TArray<Element, Dimensions>::DeepCopy(const Elements& elements, const SizesType& sizes)
00390 {
00391        I_ASSERT(int(elements.size()) == sizes[0] * sizes[1]);
00392 
00393        m_elements = elements;
00394        m_sizes = sizes;
00395 }

00413 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00414 const Element& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator*() const
00415 {

00417        I_ASSERT(IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes()));
00418 
00419        return m_arrayPtr->GetAt(*this);

00453 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00454 typename TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator& TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator++()
00455 {
00456        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !BaseClass::Increase(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00457               m_arrayPtr = NULL;
00458        }
00459 
00460        return *this;
00461 }

00480        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !Decrease(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00481               m_arrayPtr = NULL;

00501 template <class Element, int Dimensions>

00504        BaseClass::operator=(iterator);

00509 
00510 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00511 bool TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::operator==(const Iterator& iterator) const
00512 {
00513        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && (iterator.m_arrayPtr != NULL)){
00514               return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr) && (BaseClass::operator==(iterator));
00515        }
00516 
00517        return (m_arrayPtr == iterator.m_arrayPtr);
00518 }
00519 
00520 
00521 template <class Element, int Dimensions>

00523 {

00528 // protected methods of emedded class Iterator
00529 
00530 template <class Element, int Dimensions>
00531 TArray<Element, Dimensions>::Iterator::Iterator(TArray* arrayPtr)
00532 :      BaseClass(0), m_arrayPtr(arrayPtr)
00533 {
00534        if ((m_arrayPtr != NULL) && !BaseClass::IsInside(m_arrayPtr->GetSizes())){
00535               m_arrayPtr = NULL;   // if it is not inside of array set it directly to the end iterator state
00536        }
00537 }
